summary: This document outlines the establishment and modifications of the 2007 Jeffrey E. Epstein Insurance Trust #3, including the designation and acceptance of trustees, resignations, revocations of successor trustees, and changes to beneficiaries. It details the powers and responsibilities of the trustees and the conditions under which they operate.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is mentioned as the last acting Trustee of the Trust and is involved in designating additional trustees and accepting the role.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is designated as an additional Trustee of the Trust by Darren K. Indyke.

persons.name: Lawrence Newman
persons.context: Lawrence Newman is mentioned as a Trustee who resigns from the Trust and acknowledges the actions taken by the other trustees.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the Grantor of the Trust, who establishes the terms and conditions under which the Trust operates.

persons.name: Eva Andersson Dubin
persons.context: Eva Andersson Dubin is mentioned as a designated successor Trustee whose designation is revoked by Jeffrey E. Epstein.

persons.name: Abigail S. Wexner
persons.context: Abigail S. Wexner is mentioned as a designated successor Trustee whose designation is revoked by Jeffrey E. Epstein.

persons.name: Mark Lawrence Epstein
persons.context: Mark Lawrence Epstein is mentioned as a beneficiary of the Trust, entitled to certain distributions.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is mentioned as a potential beneficiary of the Trust upon the death of Jeffrey E. Epstein.

connections.description: Darren K. Indyke designates Richard Kahn as an additional Trustee of the Trust.
Darren K. Indyke and Lawrence Newman are both acting Trustees of the Trust.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is the Grantor of the Trust, and Darren K. Indyke is one of the Trustees.
Jeffrey E. Epstein originally designated Eva Andersson Dubin as a successor Trustee, which he later revoked.
Jeffrey E. Epstein originally designated Abigail S. Wexner as a successor Trustee, which he later revoked.
Mark Lawrence Epstein is the brother of Jeffrey E. Epstein and a beneficiary of the Trust.
Mark Lawrence Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell are both mentioned in the context of the Trust's beneficiaries.

events.title: Designation of Additional Trustee
events.description: Darren K. Indyke designates Richard Kahn as an additional Trustee of the Trust.

events.title: Resignation of Trustee
events.description: Lawrence Newman resigns as Trustee of the Trust.

events.title: Revocation of Successor Trustees
events.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein revokes the designation of Eva Andersson Dubin and Abigail S. Wexner as successor Trustees.

events.title: Change of Beneficiaries
events.description: The Trustees make changes to the beneficiaries of the Trust.

locations: Little St. James Island, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: Darren K. Indyke is the last acting Trustee of the Trust and designates Richard Kahn as an additional Trustee.
Lawrence Newman resigns as Trustee, effective upon the designation of an additional Trustee.
Jeffrey E. Epstein revokes the designation of Eva Andersson Dubin and Abigail S. Wexner as successor Trustees.
Mark Lawrence Epstein is a beneficiary of the Trust, entitled to certain distributions upon the death of the Grantor.
Ghislaine Maxwell is mentioned as a potential beneficiary of the Trust.
